title: Fatal: Psychic Pursuit
description: Two young psychics once again find themselves at the mercy of the U.S. Government. Three years after their deal with Archer, a new and deadly opponent comes to power. In an action packed spree ranging from New Orleans to Virginia, Cassie Reynold and Ronnie Gilmore take on two factions intent on capturing them for their psychic ability. Giving up is not an option. This war is going to be fought to a fatal conclusion.
author: Eric Drouant
